title: debug ice: `alignment mismatch between ABI and layout in TyAndLayout`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: requires-debug-assertions
labels.description: This issue requires debug-assertions in some way

body:
### Code ```Rust #![crate_type="lib"] #![feature(transmutability)] mod assert { use std::mem::BikeshedIntrinsicFrom; pub fn is_transmutable() where Dst: BikeshedIntrinsicFrom, { } } #[repr(C, packed(2))] enum V0usize { V, } fn nsize() { fn u_should_have_correct_length() { type Current = V0usize; type Analog = V0usize; type Context = V0usize; assert::is_transmutable::(); } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` b2b34bd83192c3d16c88655158f7d8d612513e88 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0517]: attribute should be applied to a struct or union --> treereduce.out:14:11 | 14 | #[repr(C, packed(2))] | ^^^^^^^^^ 15 | / enum V0usize { 16 | | V, 17 | | } | |_- not a struct or union ```
